Biteye & XHunt | Crypto Daily - October 17

ğŸ’¡ Meteora @MeteoraAG  $MET Airdrop Checker is Live!

Meteora, a major DEX on Solana, has just released the detailed allocation plan for its $MET token airdrop.

The drop is targeting a wide range of Meteora users, including early LPs, DLMM Beta testers, community contributors, and even early stakeholders from related projects like $M3M3 .

Claims will officially open on October 23rd, and users will have a generous six-month window to claim their tokens.

Check your allocation here: met.meteora.ag/

ğŸ”® Bpn Network @bpn_network Lands $50M Investment from @yzilabs 

Stablecoin payment infrastructure project Better Payment Network has successfully closed a $50 million funding round, led by YZI Labs.

BPN's core mission is to build a unified layer on BNB Chain that connects CeFi and DeFi. It aims to offer instant, low-cost, and compliant cross-border payments by supporting the minting, swapping, and settlement of various fiat-backed stablecoins.

It's also worth noting that @cz_binance retweeted the project's announcement, a huge signal of confidence.

ğŸ Ventuals @ventuals Kicks Off Public Deposit Event

Ventuals is a new Pre-IPO perpetuals market built on HIP-3, allowing users to go long or short on soon-to-be-public companies with up to 10x leverage.

The platform already lists some of the hottest assets out there, including XAI, OpenAI, and Polymarket.

They just launched a public deposit event in the last couple of days and have already attracted 1.46 million $HYPE in deposits.

ğŸŒ¾ Four Meme @four_meme_ Platform Upgrade

Four Meme has announced a major brand upgrade, officially evolving from a simple launchpad into an open Meme ecosystem protocol.

The core of this upgrade is a major overhaul of its existing models. The launch threshold for its "Fair Mode" has been massively lowered, with the required graduation market cap dropping from $1 M to just $300 K.

Alongside the upgrade, its second IDO event is now live. Anyone who accumulates 40 points by trading or staking $FORM can get in on the action from October 17th to 19th.

The above information is from the Xhunt plugin's list of trending topics and discussions.

tweets.content:
Biteye & XHunt | Crypto Trending Daily - October 16

ğŸ¤– Brevis @brevis_zk

Brevis burst onto the scene, becoming one of the very few projects to get a dual endorsement from both Vitalik Buterin and the official Ethereum account, making it an instant market focus.

At its core, Brevis uses ZK technology for "off-chain compute, on-chain validation," a model designed to break the "impossible triangle" of on-chain computation and unlock infinite compute potential for smart contracts.

Right now, users can accumulate "Sparks" points through social tasks like check-ins and reposts. This is in preparation for Phase 2, which involves on-chain interactions starting November 3rd.

Heads up: These "Sparks" are directly linked to a future token allocation.

ğŸŒˆ Momentum @MMTFinance

Buildpad has teamed up with MMTFinance to introduce a brand-new "squad challenge" model for the $MMT launch. Users can form squads of up to 10 people to compete for priority allocation by co-creating content. Winning squads are guaranteed a non-diluted token allocation of at least $150.

To participate, you need to complete KYC and form a squad on the Buildpad website, then post content on X about the value of the MMT project (tagging the official accounts), and finally submit your post link on the event page before the deadline at  on October 22nd.

ğŸŒ‡ MegaETH @megaeth_labs

MegaETH has kicked off a new public token sale on Echo's SONAR platform. This follows their $10 million community round on Echo in December 2024 and the roughly $28 million raised via an NFT public sale in February 2025.

For context, the last project to launch on this platform was the highly successful Plasma. For many in the crypto space, this makes the MegaETH sale a high-conviction play, IYKYK.

Users need to register between October 17-25 by going to the official website, proceeding to the Echo platform to complete KYC (Note: China is not supported), and linking their social accounts.

ğŸ–¼ï¸ Believe @believeapp

The Believe project has rolled out a controversial "flywheel" update. The main changes include renaming the token from $LAUNCHCOIN to   $BELIEVE and increasing the total token supply by 25%. This move has been widely criticized by the community as a selfish act that harms loyal holders, as the 25% supply increase directly dilutes their assets and the extremely short migration window is seen as punishing.

All $LAUNCHCOIN holders must manually upgrade their tokens on the official website within four weeks to avoid a potential total loss of their assets.

The above information is from the Xhunt plugin's list of trending topics and discussions.
